insert into sys_role_menu (role_id, menu_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{item.roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
